automation_email.description: Email address to send automation events to

description.description: More detailed description for the component

only_show_if_degraded.description: Should this component be shown component only if in degraded state

page_id.description: the ID of the page this component belongs to

components.description: An array with the IDs of the components in this group

description.description: More detailed description for this component group

name.description: Display name for this component group

page_id.description: the ID of the page this component group belongs to

decimal_places.description: How many decimal places to render on the graph

metric_identifier.description: The identifier used to look up the metric data from the provider

page_id.description: The ID of the page this metric belongs to

suffix.description: Suffix to describe the units on the graph

transform.description: The transform to apply to metric before pulling into Statuspage. One of: 'average', 'count', 'max', 'min', 'sum', 'response_time' or 'uptime'

y_axis_hidden.description: Should the values on the y axis be hidden on render

y_axis_max.description: The upper bound of the y axis

y_axis_min.description: The lower bound of the y axis

api_key.description: Required by the Datadog and NewRelic type metrics providers

api_token.description: Required by the Librato, Pingdom and Datadog type metrics providers

application_key.description: Required by the Pingdom-type metrics provider

email.description: Required by the Librato and Pingdom type metrics providers

metric_base_uri.description: Required by the NewRelic-type metrics provider

page_id.description: The ID of the page this metric provider belongs to

password.description: Required by the Pingdom-type metrics provider
